benchmark_details.name: Thai-H6 and Thai Cultural and Linguistic Intelligence Benchmark (ThaiCLI)
benchmark_details.overview: Two comprehensive benchmarks aimed at advancing LLM research in Thai: Thai-H6 evaluates reasoning, knowledge, and commonsense capabilities, while ThaiCLI assesses understanding of Thai cultural norms and values.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To create evaluation frameworks that rigorously assess core capabilities and cultural alignment of Thai LLMs.
purpose_and_intended_users.limitations: The benchmark may not fully capture the rich diversity of perspectives within Thai society, affecting consistency of evaluation outcomes.

data.source: Constructed from various existing datasets adapted for Thai context
data.size: Total of over 26,000 samples across all datasets
data.annotation: Human annotation by native Thai speakers with multi-round review for cultural alignment and accuracy

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on log-probability and exact match protocols as detailed in the methodology section.
methodology.interpretation: Scores reflect models' capacities to handle reasoning, knowledge, and cultural alignment tasks appropriate for Thai contexts.
methodology.baseline_results: Performance on Thai-H6 and ThaiCLI benchmarks, as evaluated across various LLMs.
methodology.validation: Validated through expert reviews and multi-step annotation processes.

targeted_risks.demographic_analysis: Analysis of cultural sensitivity and appropriateness based on demographic contexts.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: All data collected ensures participants' anonymity and respects cultural sensitivities.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.data_licensing: Open access under appropriate licensing agreements ensuring compliance with ethical standards.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.compliance_with_regulations: All data practices adhere to local and international data protection regulations.
